laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Urinary osmolalities of 112 and 101 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 1) and 150 and 138 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 2) were recorded at ages 4.5 and 5 years.

findings.Body Weight: Decreased from 12.2 kg to 10.1 kg over trial period
findings.U-Osmol: Remained relatively unchanged (235 to 229 mosmol/kg H2O)
findings.U-Vol: Decreased from 10.5 to 9.1 ml/kg per h

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreases in body weight and blood pressure correlated with time during the trial.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Activity of von Willebrand factor and clotting factor VIII
laboratory_examinations.date: After infusion of desmopressin (0.3 Î¼g/kg body wt)
